name: Utakata no R: Kako-hen Awayuki
storyline:
Tragedy strikes Orin, who was living peacefully in the village of Iga.
The girls were burned in their hometown and abducted from Earth to another world.
The planet was doomed to destruction no matter how they struggled. ....
The never-ending escape drama, the constant conflict, and the sad farewells.
The conflict of "Terror," a young man who knows that the world is about to be destroyed. The deepening bond and the broken girl.
On this planet full of despair, will they be able to reach a happy ending?
summary: "Utakata no R: Kakohen Awayuki" is a role-playing game created by "R Man 44", released in 2021.
